evidence.claim: Cohealo leverages AWS for their cloud infrastructure and services.
The company handles HIPAA-compliant data in their health tech solutions.
Integration with EHR systems is supported in compliance with HL7 standards.
Cohealo utilizes PostgreSQL for its data management needs.

icp.icp_reason: Cohealo utilizes X12 transactions for healthcare data exchange; relevant integration patterns align with ICP needs.
matched_use_cases: Integration with healthcare payers and providers
